notes: Successive attacks with Ballista do not stack the debuff, but refresh the duration instead. The knockback is not refreshed, causing the target to be unable to move and stay in place until the refreshed debuff expires.
The attacks first apply the debuff, then their own damage.
The target is not disabled during the knockback, so they still can cast spells or items, attack and turn during the push. This means it does not cancel channeling spells of the target.
abilities.description: Knocks enemies back with every attack.
